title: Barbosa de Matos e Câmara (João)
body: Born on this island, he was a law graduate from the University of Coimbra. He represented Madeira in the parliament during the legislative session from 1858 to 1869 and passed away in Funchal on May 28, 1906.

João Barbosa de Matos e Câmara: Represented Madeira in the parliament during the legislative session from 1858 to 1869

1906: Passed away in Funchal on May 28
